$interpreted: Cecil: ...My family is extremely strict. Therefore, after I saved you back then, I've never had the chance to come here and find you.
Hestia: I see...
Cecil: A few years ago, my father was framed and died as a result of it. Afterward, I've been really busy handling the family business.
Cecil: Only until recently did I finally finish cleaning up the aftermath of that incident.
Cecil: I have nothing to worry about anymore. That's why...Hestia, come with me.
Cecil: I will take you away from here and we can live happily together!
Hestia: Th-That...that...of course I'm okay with that...
Cecil: That's good to hear! Then, let's start moving right now!
Hestia: Now!? Do we have to be in such a hurry?
Cecil: Of course. The faster the better, isn't it?
Cecil: Or do you not want to come with me?
Hestia: Not at all! It's just...I have a lot of friends here. I still haven't say my goodbyes to them.
Hestia: There are also the Platypuses. Once I leave, they...
Hestia: EH!?
Hestia: Oh no, we were too focused on chatting. We've wandered into this place without realizing it!
Cecil: What's wrong?
Hestia: This is the frogodiles' territory. There are a lot of violent frogodiles living here!
Cecil: ...So this is where the frogodiles live...
Hestia: We're going to be in danger if we keep staying here. We should move, fast!
Karnulla: Not so fast! You think we're gonna let you go that easily?
Karnulla: What a rare yet pleasant surprise, mermaid. You coming to our place on your own...
Karnulla: ...Hmm, who is this human?
Hestia: Leave him alone! I will not allow you to harm my prince!
Karnulla: What, prince? So such a person actually exists?
Karnulla: Nonetheless, it's his misfortune for being together with you!
Karnulla: Boys, it's payback time!
Hestia: I'm going to be nice and give you bullies a chance to leave right now! If you don't take it, I won't be so nice on my next strike!
Karnulla: Hmph, you got lucky today. Boys, tactical retreat!
Hestia: Prince, are you alright?
Cecil: I-I'm fine. Just a small scratch. We should still leave Maple Lake as soon as possible.
Cecil: Don't waste any time...
Hestia: No. You can't overlook an injury like this.
Hestia: I'll take you to get treatment first. Once you recovered, then we can talk about leaving Maple Lake. Understood?
Cecil: If you insist...alright then.
Hestia: Good, then follow me!

Model.Text: ...My family is extremely strict. Therefore, after I saved you back then, I've never had the chance to come here and find you.
I see...
A few years ago, my father was framed and died as a result of it. Afterward, I've been really busy handling the family business.
Only until recently did I finally finish cleaning up the aftermath of that incident.
I have nothing to worry about anymore. That's why...Hestia, come with me.
I will take you away from here and we can live happily together!
Th-That...that...of course I'm okay with that...
That's good to hear! Then, let's start moving right now!
Now!? Do we have to be in such a hurry?
Of course. The faster the better, isn't it?
Or do you not want to come with me?
Not at all! It's just...I have a lot of friends here. I still haven't say my goodbyes to them.

What a rare yet pleasant surprise, mermaid. You coming to our place on your own...
...Hmm, who is this human?

Boys, it's payback time!
I'm going to be nice and give you bullies a chance to leave right now! If you don't take it, I won't be so nice on my next strike!
Hmph, you got lucky today. Boys, tactical retreat!
Prince, are you alright?
I-I'm fine. Just a small scratch. We should still leave Maple Lake as soon as possible.

No. You can't overlook an injury like this.
I'll take you to get treatment first. Once you recovered, then we can talk about leaving Maple Lake. Understood?
If you insist...alright then.
Good, then follow me!
